#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

	bool a[5000009];
	long long  int sum[5000009];

int main () {
	int i, j, t, n, m;

	for (i = 0; i < 5000009; i++) {
		a[i] = true;
	}

	a[0] = a[1] = false;
	sum [0] = sum[1] = sum[2] = 0;
	
	int z = ceil(sqrt(5000009));

	for (i = 2; i <= z; i++) {
		if (a[i] == true) {
			for (j = i + i; j < 5000009; j += i) {
				a[j] = false;
			}
			sum[i + 1] = sum[i] + i;
			continue;
		//	cout << sum[i + 1] << " \n ";
		}
		sum[i + 1] = sum[i]; 
//			cout << sum[i + 1] << " \n ";
	}  

	for (i = z + 1; i < 5000009; i++) {
		if (a[i] == true) {
			sum[i + 1] = sum[i] + i;
		//	cout << sum[i + 1] << " \n ";
			continue;
		//	cout << i << "  ";
		}
		sum[i + 1] = sum[i];

	}

	scanf("%d", &t);

	while (t--) {
		scanf ("%d%d", &n, &m);
		printf("%lld\n", sum[m + 1] - sum[n]);
	}	

	return 0;
}
